backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of several frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining OKLCH-based color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main interactive page implementing Yes/No logic, sound effects, celebration modal, and the updated rose-day visuals/messages.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationModal: Modal with confetti animation, heart visuals, and close button triggering sound on dismiss.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.ts: Hook handling user-triggered sound effects with audio initialization and rate limiting.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, global styles, animations, and rose‑themed backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH-based color system, custom animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and image specs for a Valentine UI update centered on a simplified rose-giving stick‑figure scene.
